attributes.comment:
As a mother of two children, that my husband I adopted internationally, I find this
proposal absolutely outrageous! It is ridiculous that the immigration and
citizenship fees are always increasing. It is making an already long and financially
burdensome process even more burdensome. I can't imagine what the ladies and
gentlemen who proposed these fee increases are thinking. Obviously they have
either not adopted internationally themselves or they have unlimited financial
resources that it wouldn't affect them. I just don't understand why my own
government wants to make this hard journey even harder for families like mine.
With all that is going on around the world right now that is making international
adoption even harder, I can't understand why the government of the world's leading
power wants to add to that hardship.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Leanne Underkoffler
